phononspythonic_example

This script demonstrates the usage of the phononspythonic module for quantum wire semiconductor simulations. It shows both the modern Pythonic interface and the Fortran-compatible interface.

Author: AI Assistant Date: 2024

Attributes

exit_code

Functions

create_test_system([N])

Create a test quantum wire system.

modern_pythonic_interface()

Demonstrate the modern Pythonic interface.

fortran_compatible_interface()

Demonstrate the Fortran-compatible interface.

test_cq2_function()

Test the Cq2 function for DC field calculations.

performance_comparison()

Compare performance between different system sizes.

create_visualization(solver, Win_e, Wout_e, Win_h, Wout_h)

Create visualization of phonon rates.

main()

Main example function.
